config.directions: Use the slider to learn more about fashion designers.
config.interactiveTitle: Use the slider to learn more about fashion designers.

entries.title: Sketch
entries.content:
Video of: Sketch
A person's hand can be seen creating a sketch design of a woman's dress using pencil and paper. Electronic music plays in the background with a consistent finger snapping sound.

entries.title: 3-D Model
entries.content:
Video of: 3-D Model
A person can be seen working on a computer to create a three-dimensional model of an outfit. A consistent bass drum beats as a guitar strums an upbeat and relaxing melody in the background.

entries.title: Bring to Life
entries.content:
Video of: Bring to Life
A person is seen draping fabric over a model to design an article of clothing. An electronic beat plays in the background as an electric guitar joins in to create hopeful background music.
